data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=rKSgIhnaKPgQ7kNvgFxRf8P&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDVxdwv5qag7l05tQd2KN7ITaQn8A4FOo5Se7Nk1C8dBA&oe=66683337)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=88aSo3-gJuUQ7kNvgEz6UBb&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD1M6ZsTW9_08-vHvG2-tCu-mdeG5XX0b89w8hhBZdh1w&oe=666840D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=FlrEs3kSUL4Q7kNvgHoaavh&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC0rCZZSTd6huGSTpStOMy_JKDm-qzrs46PzSzZSTEssw&oe=66682C09)
